Umhlahlandlela Wakho Olula we-SARS eFiling

I-SARS eFiling iyinkundla ye-elekthronikhi yokuthumela imibiko yakho yentela ku-intanethi. Iphephile, ilula, futhi isheshisa kunokuthumela ngesandla. Landela lo mhlahlandlela wesinyathelo ngesinyathelo ukuze uqedele umbiko wakho wentela ka-2025.

Isinyathelo 1: Bhalisa ku-eFiling

Abasebenzisi bokuqala:

  1. Vakashela www.sars.gov.za bese ucofoza ku-"eFiling"
  2. Cofoza "Bhalisa" bese ukhetha "Umuntu"
  3. Faka inombolo yakho ye-ID, inombolo yesithenjwa sentela yengeniso, kanye nemininingwane yokuxhumana
  4. Dala igama lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi
  5. I-SARS izokuthumelela i-PIN nge-SMS noma nge-imeyili
  6. Sebenzisa i-PIN ukuze unike amandla iphrofayili yakho ye-eFiling

Okozokudinga:

  • Inombolo ye-ID yaseNingizimu Afrika noma iphasipoti
  • Inombolo yesithenjwa sentela yengeniso (uma unayo)
  • Ikheli le-imeyili elisebenzayo
  • Inombolo yocingo lwaseNingizimu Afrika
  • Imininingwane yamabhange

Isinyathelo 2: Qoqa Amadokhumenti Akho

Amadokhumenti abalulekile onyaka wentela ka-2025:

  • Isitifiketi se-IRP5: Esivela kumqashi wakho (sibonisa iholo, intela ekhishiwe, njll.)
  • Izitifiketi ze-IT3(a): Zenzalo etholakele emabhangeni
  • Izitifiketi ze-IT3(b): Zamadividendi atholiwe
  • Isitifiketi Soncedo Lwezempilo: Sibonisa iminikelo nezinzuzo
  • Isitifiketi Sesikhwama Sokuphumula: Sibonisa iminikelo yepenshini/yesikhwama sokuzinikela
  • Isitifiketi Sesikhwama se-RA: Seminikelo ye-annuity yokuphumula
  • Amarekhodi Engeniso Yokuqasha: Izitatimende zengeniso nezindleko
  • Izitatimende Zokutshala Imali: Inzuzo/ukulahlekelwa kwemali, ukutshala imali kwamanye amazwe
  • Amarekhodi Ebhizinisi: Uma uzisebenzela noma ungeniso yebhizinisi
  • Amakwiti Okunikela: Amakwiti esigaba 18A okunikela okususwa entela

Isinyathelo 3: Ngena Bese Uqala Umbiko Wakho

  1. Iya ku-www.sars.gov.za bese ucofoza "eFiling"
  2. Faka igama lakho lomsebenzisi nephasiwedi
  3. Cofoza ku-"Imibiko" kumenyu eyinhloko
  4. Khetha "Umbiko Wentela Yengeniso (ITR12)" wabantu
  5. Khetha unyaka wentela ka-2025
  6. Cofoza "Dala Umbiko" ukuze uqale
Ithiphu: I-SARS ingase igcwalise ngaphambili eminye imininingwane evela kwizinhlangano zangaphandle (abaqashi, amabhange, njll.). Hlala uqinisekisa ukuthi le mininingwane ilungile futhi iphelele.

Isinyathelo 4: Qedela Isigaba Ngasinye

Izigaba eziyinhloko zokuqedela:

Imininingwane Yomuntu Siqu
  • Qinisekisa imininingwane yakho yomuntu siqu
  • Buyekeza imininingwane yokuxhumana uma kudingeka
  • Qinisekisa imininingwane yamabhange yokubuyiselwa
Ingeniso (Imali Engenayo)
  • Ingeniso yomsebenzi evela ku-IRP5
  • Inzalo namadividendi
  • Ingeniso yokuqasha
  • Ingeniso yebhizinisi
  • Ingeniso yasemzini
Ukususa
  • Iminikelo yesikhwama sokuphumula
  • Iminikelo yoncedo lwezempilo
  • Iminikelo ku-PBOs
  • Izindleko zebhizinisi
  • Izindleko zehhovisi lasekhaya
Amakrediti Entela
  • Ikrediti yentela yemali yohlelo lwezempilo
  • Izindleko ezingeziwe zezempilo
  • Amakrediti entela yasemzini

Isinyathelo 5: Buyekeza Bese Uthumela

  1. Buyekeza zonke izigaba: Hlola ukufaka ngakunye ukuze kuqiniseke
  2. Sebenzisa ikhalkhuletha: I-eFiling izobala intela yakho ngokuzenzakalela
  3. Hlola isifinyezo: Buyekeza isikweletu sakho sentela esiphelele noma ukubuyiselwa
  4. Qinisekisa umbiko: I-eFiling izohlola amaphutha
  5. Thumela umbiko wakho: Cofoza "Thumela" uma usuthokozile
  6. Phrinta/gcina ukuqinisekisa: Gcina ukuvuma kokutholakala
Okubalulekile: Uma usuthumele, awukwazi ukwenza izinguquko kalula. Ungase udinge ukucela ukubuyekezwa noma ufayile isikhalazo ngezinguquko ezibalulekile.

Isinyathelo 6: Ngemva Kokuthumela

Okwenzeka okulandelayo:

  • Ukuhlolwa: I-SARS izocubungula umbiko wakho (ngokuvamile phakathi kwezinsuku ezingu-21 zebhizinisi)
  • Isaziso: Uzothola i-SMS/imeyili lapho ukuhlolwa kwakho sekulungile
  • Hlola ukuhlolwa kwakho: Ngena ku-eFiling ukuze ubone Isaziso Sokuhlolwa kwakho
  • Ukubuyiselwa: Uma kufanele ubuyiselwe, kuzokhokhwa ku-akhawunti yakho yamabhange ebhaliselwe
  • Ukukhokha: Uma unesikweletu sentela, khokha ngosuku olubekiwe ukuze ugweme izijeziso nenzalo

Izinketho zokukhokha uma unesikweletu sentela:

  • Ukukhokha kwe-eFiling ku-intanethi
  • Amabhange e-intanethi
  • Ukukhokha kwe-ATM
  • Amahhovisi amabhange
  • Amahhovisi e-SARS

Amathiphu Abalulekile Empumelelweni

Gcina Amarekhodi

Gcina wonke amadokhumenti asekela iminyaka emi-5. I-SARS ingawacela ngesikhathi sokuhlolwa noma ukubuyekezwa.

Fayila Kusengaphambili

Thumela umbiko wakho kude kakhulu ngaphambi komhla wokugcina ukuze ugweme izijeziso futhi uthole ukubuyiselwa ngokushesha.

Hlola Kabili

Qinisekisa wonke amanani ngokumelene nezitifiketi nezitatemende zakho. Amaphutha angabangela ukuhlolwa noma izijeziso.

Gcina Inqubekelaphambili

I-eFiling igcina umsebenzi wakho ngokuzenzakalela, kodwa gcina njalo ngesandla ukuze ugweme ukulahlekelwa idatha.

Thola Usizo

Sebenzisa izinsiza zosizo ze-SARS, ochwepheshe bentela, noma iSikhungo Sokuxhumana (0800 00 7277) uma udinga usizo.

Buyekeza Imininingwane

Gcina imininingwane yakho yokuxhumana neyamabhange isesikhathini ukuze uqinisekise ukuxhumana okuhle nokukhokha ukubuyiselwa.

Amaphutha Avamile Okufanele Uwagweme

  • Imininingwane yamabhange engalungile: Hlola kabili izinombolo ze-akhawunti zokukhokha ukubuyiselwa
  • Ingeniso edukile: Faka YONKE imithombo yengeniso, ngisho namanani amancane
  • Ukubanga ukususa okungavumelekile: Banga kuphela izindleko ezisemthethweni, ezisekelwe
  • Ukuziba amehlo kwidatha egcwaliswe ngaphambili: Qinisekisa futhi ulungise noma yiluphi ulwazi olungalungile olugcwaliswe ngaphambili
  • Ukuthumela muva: Fayila ngaphambi komhla wokugcina ukuze ugweme izijeziso
  • Ukungagcini amarekhodi: Gcina amadokhumenti asekela zonke izimangalo

Imihlangano Ebalulekile Yonyaka Wentela ka-2025

Imibiko Yabantu (eFiling)

31 Okthoba 2025

Imibiko Yabantu (Ngesandla)

31 Julayi 2025

Intela Yesikhashana (Inkokhelo Yesi-2)

31 Agasti 2025

Imibiko Yentela Yesikhashana

31 Januwari 2026

Udinga Usizo?

Isikhungo Sokuxhumana se-SARS

0800 00 7277 (mahhala)

NgoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu: 8:00 - 16:00

Iwebhusayithi ye-SARS

www.sars.gov.za

Imihlahlandlela ephelele, amafomu, namathebula entela

Amahhovisi e-SARS

Vakashela ihhovisi le-SARS eliseduze nawe

Bhuka ama-aphoyintimenti ku-intanethi ukuze uthole usizo lomuntu siqu

Ochwepheshe Bentela

Ochwepheshe bentela ababhalisiwe nababhali-zincwadi

Usizo lochwepheshe lwemibiko eyinkimbinkimbi
